attachments.title: syscall: windows Open() should use FILE_SHARE_DELETE · Issue #32088 · golang/go
attachments.text: On Linux & MacOS we can write this; on Windows it fails with a &quot;sharing violation&quot;: path := &quot;delete-after-open&quot; fd, err := os.OpenFile(path, os.O_RDWR|os.O_CREATE, 0600) if ...

text: FILE_SHARE_DELETE が UNIX のそれと同じだと思ってる人、一定数いるなぁ。
